title: Why hate teemo when there's...
body:
Instead of jumping on the teemo hate bandwagon, here's a list of champions that you can hate on instead. In my personal opinion, a lot of these are a whole lot worse.

Illaoi-the new cancer of toplane. No matter who you pick against her, laning phase is a fucking nightmare. She can harass from distance with her q then chunk you down to half health with her e. To this day she is the scariest toplaner to lane against in my opinion.

Lux-Her snare is obnoxious as fuck and so easy to land. Her E has some of the biggest 100-0 potential in the game and is basically a jhin w on steroids. On top of that, all her abilities are hard to dodge due to the deceptive hit boxes. When you think you've dodged her e, you still take damage and die.

Yasuo- ok, let never this straight. I have some problems with Yasuo as a champion, but the main thing that makes yasuo so damn cancerous is the people that play him. I have yet to meet a Yasuo main who is not rude, disrespectful, egotistical, and overly toxic. I've never seen this happen before, but I've heard stories of yasuo mains feeding and trolling if they don't get their position or yasuo gets picked or banned.

Irelia-Triforce made her disgusting, that's all there is to say.

Vlad-His still a really strong pick for toplane and mid, but in my opinion, the most obnoxious part of his kit is his stupid blood pool  untargetable bullshit.

Swain-I haven't played against him that much, but when I have its one of the scariest experiences ever. He's just really, really, strong right now, enough said.

Malzahar-He's literally a walking talking purple cancer cell. His silence and how tanky he can get is just disgusting. The worst part? Riot keeps buffing him for some reason.

Cho'gath-now this may seem weird to be on this list, but I hate playing against cho. No matter how much a dominate him in his laning phase, he always just seems to get so damn tanky.

Nasus-he's really weird to play against in general. He's kind of like a ticking time bomb, where you know if you let it get to late game and if you let him farm, he will fuck over your game singlehandedly. The other problem is, you have to prevent him from farming his q, but you can't all in him, cause he's a really strong duelist.

Blitz-no explanation needed 

If you have any champion you hate, comment them down below. Thanks!
